scripts.sync-webhooks: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {BuybackBurnService} = require('./service'); const s = new BuybackBurnService({seedPhrase: process.env.SEED_PHRASE, heliusApiKey: process.env.HELIUS_API_KEY, supabaseUrl: process.env.SUPABASE_URL, supabaseKey: process.env.SUPABASE_KEY, webhookUrl: process.env.WEBHOOK_URL}); s.syncWebhooks().then(r => console.log('âœ… Synced:', JSON.stringify(r, null, 2))).catch(e => console.error('âŒ Error:', e.message));"
